title: BookVerse
description: Designed and developed a full stack online bookstore with admin functionalities.Built a responsive frontend using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind for smooth UX across all devices.Developed a robust backend API using Node.js and Express.js to handle book data, user operations, and server logic.Integrated MongoDB database for storing book inventory, user information, and order

title: VocaHire - Al Voice Interview Platform
description: Built a real-time Al voice interview platform using Next.js and Vapi.Integrated voice streaming and Al response via Vapi SDK.Designed responsive UI with Tailwind CSS.Used Firebase for auth and real-time data storage.

title: Website-based Simon Game
description: The game involves a sequence of colored buttons that light up and play sounds, which the player needs to replicate.
